overview_of_class: This second course builds upon the material presented in the first term, introducing additional fundamental sentence structures, expanding vocabulary, and providing students an opportunity to further practice and expand the basic skills acquired in the first segment. As with 111-1, students should plan on significant homework outside of class, in addition to the daily class meeting.
name: Arabic I
title: WCAS ARABIC 111-2-20 Arabic I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This second course builds upon the material presented in the first term, introducing additional fundamental sentence structures, expanding vocabulary, and providing students an opportunity to further practice and expand the basic skills acquired in the first segment. As with 111-1, students should plan on significant homework outside of class, in addition to the daily class meeting.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Al-Kitaab fii Tacallum al-cArabiyya
A Textbook for Beginning Arabic: Part One
Third Edition (July 2011)
Kristen Brustad, Mahmoud Al-Batal, and Abbas Al-TonsiGeorgetown University Press
ISBN: 978-1589017368

subject: ARABIC
